column4: anyone else? how can I disable automatic updates to resolv.conf?
maybe dhcp3 client is rewriting it..
how would I tell that? I don't see any special things in there
and what is the actual problem for you?
I think it's using routers DNS, which is pinging my ISP, which DNSs are down
that's way I want to force opendns
my internet connection is absolutely unusable
looks like dhcp3 is causing that, i had similar problem..
edit dhcp3 client setting so it is not updating DNS servers
which line? what should it contain? any hints?
anybody ... is it possible to open VNC server on active desktop
